TopicTitle: Start to a Mun base for science!

Articles.Content:
After watching OperationDx on YouTube and his videos on career mode I got struck by inspiration by his rover he put on the Mun. So I wanted my own rover for science! Probably gonna be roving around in this thing for awhile today lol! Haven't been this happy to land on the mun since my very first time. Thanks to science!

Images here: http://imgur.com/a/8jZXh#0
